questions.question_text: You want your expense auditors to audit only expense reports for specific business units. How do you do this?

Your intercompany transaction type is active and enabled for invoicing. What are the two prerequisites to generate intercompany receivables and intercompany payable transactions after the Generate Intercompany Allocations process is run?

choices.A: For the Legal Jurisdiction, Legal function: "Generate intercompany invoice" should be assigned.
choices.C: Supplier site primary pay flag and customer account bill to primary flag should be enabled.
choices.E: Run the processes Transfer Intercompany transactions to Receivables and Transfer Intercompany transactions to Payables.
choices.D: Run the processes Create Intercompany transactions to Receivables and Create Intercompany transactions to Payables.
choices.F: Manual Approvals should be allowed for the transaction type.
choices.B: Schedule create accounting for the intercompany process.

discussion.content: B. Supplier, Supplier Site, Supplier Site Contacts, Supplier Site Assignments

discussion.content: B. Supplier, Supplier Site, Supplier Site Contacts, Supplier Site Assignments

questions.question_text: In what order should the import process be run when importing suppliers?

choices.A: Supplier, Supplier Site Contacts, Supplier Site, Supplier Site Assignment
choices.B: Supplier, Supplier Site, Supplier Site Contacts, Supplier Site Assignments
choices.C: Supplier, Supplier Site Assignment, Supplier Site, Supplier Contacts

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about processing corporate card expenses?

discussion.content:
A. Conversion rate defaults apply only to cash expenses, not to corporate card expenses.
B. Usage policy for expense category tolerances does not apply to credit card expenses.
B. Supplier, Supplier Site, Supplier Site Contacts, Supplier Site Assignments

choices.E: Conversion rate defaults are applicable to corporate card expenses, just as they are applicable to cash expenses.
choices.A: Conversion rate defaults apply only to cash expenses, not to corporate card expenses.
choices.D: You can process payment for credit card using Electronic funds transfer, check, or wire.
choices.B: Usage policy for expense category tolerances does not apply to credit card expenses.
choices.C: Card transactions will be paid directly from Expenses Cloud.
